sentence.Network_en: He felt much better after the doctor did a phlebotomy on him.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from late Latin phlebotomia from Greek, from phleps, phleb- 'vein' + -tomia 'cutting'

means.word_mean: 1. surgical incision into a vein; used to treat hemochromatosis
